Translations.Text: Kare wa kotaete itta. `Anata wa, watashi to issho ni wa tae rarenai to, tsugenakatta ka

Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Kongo watashi ga, nanika ni tsuite anata ni tazunetanaraba, watashi o michidzure ni shinaide kudasai. (Sudeni) anata wa watashi kara no o yurushi no negai o,(subete) o ukeire kudasaimashita

Sorekara 2-ri wa tabi o tsudzukete, aru machi no jūmin no tokoro made kita. Soko no murabito ni shokumotsu o motometaga, kare-ra wa 2-ri o kantai suru koto o kyohi shita. Sonotoki 2-ri wa, masani taoren bakari no kabe o mitsukete, kare wa sore o naoshite yatta. Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Moshi nozondanaraba, sorenitaishite kitto hōshū ga toretadeshou
Kare wa itta. `Kore de watashi to anata wa o wakaredearu. Sate, anata ga yoku tae rarenakatta koto ni tsuite setsumei shite miyou

Fune ni tsuite iu to, soreha umi de hataraku aru binbōnin-tachi no shoyūdeatta. Watashi ga sore o yakudatanai yō ni shiyou to shita no wa, kare-ra no haigo ni hitori no ō ga ite, subete no fune o gōdatsu suru tamedeatta
Otokonoko ni tsuite ieba, kare no ryōshin wa shinjadeattaga, watashi-tachi wa, kare no hankō to fushinjin ga, ryōshin ni rui o oyobosu koto o osoreta nodearu
Sorede watashi-tachi wa,-nushi ga kare yori mo sugureta seishitsu no, junketsu de motto kōkōna (musuko) o, kare-ra ryōnin no tame ni sazukeru yō negatta nodearu

Ano kabe wa machi no 2-ri no osananai minashigo no mono de, sono-ka ni wa, kare-ra ni kizoku suru zaihō ga umete ari, chichioya wa tadashī jinbutsudeatta. Sorede omo wa, kare-ra ga seinen ni tasshite kara, sono zaihō o kare-ra ryōnin no tame ni horidasu koto o nozoma reta. (Koreha)-nushi kara no onmegumidearu. Watashi ga katte ni itta kotode wa nakatta noda. Kore ga anata no tae rarenakatta koto no setsumeidearu
Kare-ra wa, zu ru karunain ni tsuite anata ni toudearou. Itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa kare ni tsuite, anata gata ni aru monogatari o shiyou
Hontōni ware wa, chijō ni kare (no kensei) o uchi-date, mata subete no koto o, jōju suru ki ni naru mono o sazuketa
Sore de kare wa, hitotsu no michi o tadotta

Kare ga taiyō no shizumu (kuni) ni kuru to, sore ga doro no izumi ni bossuru no o mitome, sono chikaku ni ichishuzoku o mitsuketa. Ware wa (reikan o tōshite) itta. `Zu ru karunain yo, kare-ra o 懲 Shimete mo yoi. Mata shinsetsu ni kare-ra o taigū shite mo yoi
Kare wa itta. `Daredemo fugi o okonau mono ni wa, watashi-tachi wa keibatsu o kuwaeru. Sorekara kare o omoni kaera se, kare wa, genkei o motte kare (hanzai-sha) o chōbatsu sa rerudearou
Mata dare demo shinkō shite, zenkō ni isoshimu mono ni wa, yoi hōshō ga arou. Mata watashi-tachi wa, an'ina koto o meijirudearou
Sorekara kare wa,(-gai no) hitotsu no michi o tadotta
Kare ga taiyō no noboru (kuni) ni kita toki, sore ga ichi shuzoku no ue ni nobori, ware ga sore (taiyō) ni taishi, kare-ra no tame ni ōi o mōkenai no o mitometa
Sonoyōni shi (te sotto oi)ta. Ware wa kare ga motsu mono o shiri tsukushite iru
Sore kara kare wa (sarani soto no) hitotsu no michi o tadotta
Kare ga 2tsu no yama no ma ni kita toki, kare wa sono fumoto ni 凡 N do kotoba o kai shinai ichi shuzoku o mitsuketa
Kare-ra wa itta. `Zu ru karunain yo, ya~aju ― ju to ma~ajūju ga, kono kuni de aku o hataraite imasu. Sorede watashi-tachi wa zei o osamemasukara, bōheki o kizuite kudasaimasen ka

Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Omo ga watashi ni sadzuke rareta (chikara) wa,(kono shuzoku yori mo) sugurete iru. Sorede anata gataga, chikarawaza de tasukete kurerunaraba, watashi wa anata gata to kare-ra to no ma ni bōheki o kizukou

Tetsu no katamariri o watashi no tokoro ni motte ki nasai.' Yagate 2tsu no yama no ma no kūchi ga mitasa reta toki, kare wa itta. `Fuke. Sore ga hi ni naru made.'(Mata) kare wa itta. `Toketa dō o motte kite sono-jō ni sosoge
Sore de kare-ra (gaiteki) wa, sore ni noboru koto mo dekizu, mata sore ni anawohoru koto mo dekinakatta
Kare wa itta. `Kore wa, watashi no nushi kara no o jihidearu. Shikashi omo no yakusoku ga yattekuru toki, kare wa sore o konagona ni sa reyou. Watashi no omo no o yakusoku wa shinjitsudearu
Sonohi ware wa, hito o otagaini oshiyoseru nami no yō ni makaseyou. Sonotoki rappa ga fuka re, sorede ware wa subete no mono o isseini atsumeru
Sonohi ware wa, fushin-sha-tachi ni jigoku o gen washi,-bi no hen ni miseru
Me ni kutsugae ga sa rete ita mono wa, ware o nenjiru koto kara (tōzakari), kiku koto mo dekinaide ita
Shinjinai-sha-tachi wa, ware o sashioite ware no shimo be o hogo-sha to suru koto ga dekiru to kangaeru no ka. Hontōni ware wa, fushin-sha o kantai suru tame ni, jigoku o junbi shite iru
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Dare ga okonai ni oite saidai no shippai-shadearu ka, tsugeyou ka
Tsumari jibunde wa yoi koto o shite iru to, kare-ra wa kangaete iruga, gense no seikatsu ni oite no doryoku ga, subete machigatta michi ni itte shimau yōna-sha-tachidearu
Korera no mono wa,-nushi no shirushi, mata omo to no kaiken o shinjinai-sha-tachi de, kare-ra no okonai wa muda ni nari, ware wa shinpan no hi ni kare-ra ni don'na mekata mo ataenaidearou
Sore ga kare-ra ni totte tōzen no mukui no jigokudearu. Kare-ra wa shinkō o kyohi shi, ware no shirushi ya shito-tachi o chōshō shitakaradearu
Hontōni shinkō shite zenkō ni hagemu mono ni taisuru kantai wa, tengoku no rakuendearu
Kare-ra wa soko ni eien ni sumou. Kare-ra wa soko kara utsuru koto o nozomanai

Itte yaru ga ī. `Tatoe umi ga,-nushi no o kotoba o shirusu tame no sumideatte mo,-nushi no o kotoba ga tsukinai naka ni, umi wa kanarazu tsukai tsukusa reyou. Tatoe watashi-tachi ga (hoka no) sore to onaji (umi) o hojū no tame ni motte mo

Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Watashi wa anata gata to onaji, tada no ningen ni suginai. Anata gata no kami wa, yuiitsu no kami (arrā)dearu koto ga, watashi ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Oyoso daredemo,-nushi to no kaiken o koi negau mono wa, tadashī okonai o shi nasai. Kare no omo o Takashiru baai ni nanihitotsu (dōi ni) haichi shite sūhai shite wa naranai
Kāfu hā yā Ain sādo
(Koreha) anata no omo ga, shimo be no zakarīyā ni o jihi o ataeta koto no kijutsudearu
Kare ga hisoka ni seigan shite, omoni inotta toki o omoe
Kare wa itta. `Omo yo, watashi no hone wa hontōni yowamari, mata atama no kami wa haiiro ni kagayakimasu. Daga omo yo, watashi wa anata ni o inori shite, onmegumi o atae rarenai koto wa arimasen
Tadatada watashi no nochi no, kinshin (to dōhō no koto) o osoremasu. Watashi no tsuma wa funindesu. Sorede anata no omoto kara, sōzoku-sha o watashi ni o sazuke kudasai
Watashi o tsuga se, mata yaakōbu no ie o tsuga sete kudasai. Omo yo, kare o o inikanau-sha ni shite kudasai
(Nushi wa ōse rareta. ) `Zakarīyā yo, hontōni ware wa anata ni, yahiyā to iu na no musuko no kippō o tsutaeru. Ware wa imada katsute darenimo sononaha sadzukenakatta
Kare wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi ni dōshite musuko ga arimashou. Watashi no tsuma wa funindesu. Sono Ue watashi wa kiwamete kōrei ni narimashita
Kare wa itta. `Sōdearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ōse rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yōina kotodearu. Anata ga nani mo nai toki ni, ware ga izen anata o tsukutta yō ni.”
Kare wa mōshiageta. `Omo yo shirushi o o shimeshi kudasai.' Kare wa itta. `Anata no karada wa, kenzendearinagara, shirushi to shite 3 yoru no ma hito ni hanasenaku narudearou
Sokode kare wa Sei-sho o dete hitobito no tokoro ni kite,`asanayūna (omo o) tatae nasai.' To temane de tsutaeta
(Soshite kare no musuko ni.)`Yahiyā yo, keiten o shikkari to mamore.'(To meirei ga kudatta). Soshite ware wa, yōshō (no toki) kare ni eichi o sazuke
mata waga moto kara jiai to seijun'na kokoro o sazuketa. Kare wa omo o osore
fubo ni kōkō de kōmandenaku, somuku koto mo nakatta
Kare no seitan no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, kare no ue ni heian'are
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, maruyamu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Ka no on'na ga kazoku kara hanarete azuma no ba ni hiki komotta toki
ka no on'na wa kare-ra kara (mi o saegiru) maku o tareta. Sonotoki ware wa waga seirei (jiburīru) o tsukawashita. Kare wa 1-ri no rippana ningen no sugata de kano on'na no mae ni arawareta
Kano on'na wa itta. `Anata (jiburīru) ni taishite jihibukaki okata no mikago o inorimasu. Moshi anata ga,-nushi o osorete ora rerunaraba (watashi ni chikayoranaide kudasai)
Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, anata no nushi kara tsukawasa reta shito ni suginai. Seijun'na musuko o anata ni sazukeru (shirase no) tame ni
Ka no on'na wa itta. `Imada katsute, dare mo watashi ni furemasen. Mata watashi wa futeide mo arimasen. Dōshite watashi ni musuko ga arimashou

Kare (tenshi) wa itta. `Sōdearou. (Daga) anata no omo wa ōse rareru. “Sore wa ware ni totte wa yōina kotodearu. Sore de kare (musuko) o hitobito e no shirushi to nashi, mata ware kara no jihi to suru tamedearu. (Kore wa sudeni) arrā no o meirei ga atta kotodearu.”
Kōshite, ka no on'na wa kare (musuko) o ninshin shitanode, tōi tokoro ni hiki komotta
Daga bunben no kutsū no tame ni, natsumeyashi no kan ni omomuki, ka no on'na wa itta. `Ā , kon'na kotoni naru mae ni, watashi wa naki mono ni nari, bōkyaku no naka ni kietakatta
Sonotoki (koe ga atte) ka no on'na o shita no kata kara yonda. `Kanashinde wa naranai. Omo wa anata no ashimoto ni Ogawa o tsukura reta
Mata natsumeyashi no kan o, anata no kata ni yuriugokase. Shinsen'na juku shita natsumeyashi no mi ga ochite koyou

Tabe katsu nonde, anata no me o hiyashi nasai. Soshite moshi dareka o mitanaraba,“watashi wa jihibukaki omo ni, saikai no yakusoku o shimashita. Sorede kyō wa, dare tomo o hanashi itashimasen. ” To itte yaru ga ī
Sorekara kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o daite jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaette kita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Maruyamu yo, anata wa, nanto taihen'na koto o shite kureta no ka
Hārūn no shimai yo, anata no chichi wa warui hitode wa nakatta. Hahaoya mo futei no on'nade wa nakatta nodaga
Sokode kano on'na wa, kare (musuko) o yubisashita. Kare-ra wa itta. `Dōshite watashi-tachi wa, Yō kago no naka no akanbō ni hanasu koto ga dekiyou ka
(Sonotoki) kare (musuko) wa itta. `Watashi wa, hontōni arrā no shimo bedesu. Kare wa keiten o watashi ni atae, mata watashi o yogen-sha ni nasa remashita
Mata kare wa, watashi ga doko ni iyoutomo shukufuku o ataemasu. Mata seimei no aru kagiri reihai o sasage, kisha o suru yō, watashi ni o meiji ni narimashita
Mata watashi no haha ni kōyō o tsukusa se, kōman'na megumarenai-sha ni nasa remasendeshita
Mata watashi no shussei no hi, shikyo no hi, fukkatsu no hi ni, watashi no ue ni heian ga arimasu yō ni
Sono ko to (īsā ga maruyamu no kodearu koto) ni tsuite, kare-ra (Yudaya kyōto, kirisutokyōto) wa utagatte iruga hontōni shinjitsu sonomonodearu
Arrā ni kodomo ga dekiru nado to iu koto wa arienai. Kare ni tatae are. Kare ga ichiji o kettei sa re, tada `are.' To ōse ni nareba, sunawachi aru nodearu
Hontōni arrā wa, watashi no omodeari, mata anata gata no omode ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsukae nasai. Kore koso tadashī michidearu
Sorenanoni kare-ra no ma de, sho shūha ga kotonaru. Shinjinai mono koso wazawaidearu. Idainaru Ni~Tsu no shinpan no tame ko
Kare-ra ga wa ga mae ni makari deru hi, nanto hakkiri to kikoe mata mierudearou ka. Daga fugimono-tachi wa, kyō (gense de) wa akiraka ni 迷誤 No naka ni iru
Anata wa kaikon no hi (fukkatsu no hi) ni tsuite, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai. Sonotoki, koto wa kettei sa reru nodearu. Kare-ra ga yudan shi, mata fushinjindearu ma ni
Ware wa, daichi to sono-jō ni aru subete no mono o sōzoku suru. Mata ware ni, kare-ra wa kaeru nodearu
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, iburāhīmu (no monogatari) o nobeyo. Hontōni kare wa shōjiki-shadeari yogen-shadeatta
Kare ga chichi ni kō itta toki o omoe. `Chichiyo, anata wa naze kiki mo, mi mo shinaide, mata wazuka no eki o mo ataenai mono (bokuseki no gūzō) o sūhai nasaru no ka
Chichiyo, anata ga sazukatte inai chishiki ga, ima, tashikani watashi ni kudatta. Dakara watashi ni shitagai nasai. Watashi wa anata o tadashī michi ni michibikudeshou
Chichiyo, akuma ni tsukaete wa narimasen. Hontōni akuma wa jihibukaki okata ni taisuru muhon-shadesu
Chichiyo, hontōni watashi wa jihibukaki okata kara no chōbatsu ga, anata ni kudaru koto o osoremasu. Sorede anata ga, akuma no tomo ni naru koto o shinpai shite imasu
Kare (chichi) wa itta. `Iburāhīmu yo, anata wa watashi-tachi no kamigami o kyohi suru no ka. Moshi sore o tomenainara, kanarazu anata o ishi-uchi ni surudearou. Sā towa ni watashi kara hanare sare
Kare wa itta. `Anata ni heian'are. Watashi no omo ni, anata no tame o yurushi o inoru. Hontōni kare wa, watashi ni taishi jihibukaku ara remasu

Watashi wa anata gatakara hanare, mata arrā igai ni anata gata ga inoru mono kara hanarete, watashi no omo ni inorimasu. Watashi no omo ni o inori sureba, osoraku (omo no) onmegumi no nai me ni awanaideshou

Sore de kare (iburāhīmu) ga, kare-ra to arrā igai ni kare-ra ga tsukaeru mono kara hanare satta toki, ware wa kare ni isuhāku to yaakōbu o sazuketa. Soshite ware wa kare-ra o sorezore yogen-sha ni shita
Ware wa, kare-ra no ue ni jihi o tare, mata sūkōna shinjitsu o tsutaeru shita o sazuketa
Mata kono Keisuke no naka de, mūsā no koto o nobeyo. Hontōni kare wa, seijitsudeari, shitodeari yogen-shadeatta
Ware wa (Shinai) yama no migi ga wakara kare ni yobikake, mitsudan no tame ware no chikaku ni maneki yoseta
Mata ware no jihi ni yori, sono ani no hārūn o, yogen-sha to shite kare ni sazuketa
Mata isumāīru no koto o, kono Keisuke no naka de nobeyo. Hontōni kare wa yakusoku shita koto ni chūjitsude, shitodeari yogen-shadeatta
Kare wa itsumo sono ichizoku ni, reihai to kisha o meirei shi,-nushi no aisareru hitorideatta
Mata idorīsu no koto o, kono Keisuke no naka de nobeyo. Kare wa shōjikina jinbutsudeari yogen-shadeatta
Soshite ware wa kare o takai chii ni ageta

Korera no mono wa, arrā ga onkei o hodokosa reta yogen-sha-tachi de, ādamu no shison de, ware ga nūfu to issho ni (hakobune de) hakonda-sha-tachi no shisondeari, mata iburāhīmu to isurāīru (yaako ̄bu) no shison no naka, ware ga erande michibiita-sha-tachidearu. Jihibukaki okata no shirushi ga kare-ra ni dokuju sa reru tabi ni, kare-ra wa fuku shite sajida shi namidawonagasu. 〔Sajida〕
sorenanoni kare-ra no kōkei-sha ga reihai o okotari, shiyoku ni fukettanode, yagate hametsu ni tōmen suru koto ni narudearou
Daga kaigo shite shinkō shi, zenkō ni dō shimu mono wa betsudearu. Korera no mono wa rakuen ni hairi, sukoshi mo futōna atsukai o ukeru koto wanaidearou
Adon (eden) no rakuen, soreha shinjite ite mo me ni wa mienai monodaga, jihibukai okata ga sono shimo be-tachi ni yakusoku nasa reta monodearu. Hontōni kare no yakusoku wa, itsumo kansui sa reru
Kare-ra wa sokode wa muyō no hanashi o kikazu, tada 々 `Heian'are.'(To iu go o kiku) dakedearou. Kare-ra wa asanayūna, sokode onmegumi o atae rareru
Kore ga rakuendearu. Omo o osoreta waga shimo be ni tsuga seru tokorodearu

(Tenshi-tachi wa iu. ) `Watashi-tachi wa,-nushi no o meirei ni yoru soto wa kudaranai. Watashi-tachi izen no koto, watashi-tachi-igo no koto, mata sonoaida no subete no koto wa, kare no sube rareru tokoro. Anata gata no omo wa kesshite wasure rarenai

(Kare wa) ten to ji, mata sonoaida ni aru subete no yū no omode ara reru.Dakara kare ni tsukae, kare e no hōshi no tame ni taeshinobi nasai. Anata wa kare to kata o narabe yobu mono o (soto ni) shitte iru no ka
Hito wa iu. `Ittai watashi ga shinda toki, yagate yomigaeru nodearou ka
Hito wa omowanai no ka. Ware wa izen nani mo nai tokoro kara, kare (ningen) o tsukutta nodearu
Sorede anata no omo ni yotte, ware wa kare-ra soshite akuma-tachi o kanarazu shōshū suru. Sorekara ware wa, kanarazu kare-ra o jigoku no shūi ni hikitate (kare-ra o osore-sen kase) moro kaseyou
Sorekara ware wa, kaku shūha kara jihibukaki okata ni somuku koto no Jinkichi shī-sha o, kanarazu (soba ni) nukidasu
Sonotoki dare ga soko de yaka reru ni fusawashī ka o jukuchi suru no wa, masani waredearu
Soshite anata gata no naka ichi-ri mo sore o tōrikosenai. Kore wa anata gata no omo ga, nashitoge rareru goshin inochidearu
Shikashi ware wa omo o osoreru keiken'na-sha o sukui, fugi o okonatta mono wa hizamazuita mama de hanatte okou
Waga Kōmeina shirushi ga kare-ra ni dokuju sa reru toki, shinjinai-sha-tachi wa shinkō suru mono ni mukatte,`dochiraga chii ni oite takaku, mata dochira ga kimaegaī ka' nado to iu
Daga ware wa ikaga ni busshi no hōfuna, mata misekake no kagayakashī ōku no sedai o, kare-ra izen ni horoboshita kotodearou ka

Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Mayotte iru mono demo jihibukai okata wa kare-ra ni taishi inochi o nobasa reru. Daga sore mo kare-ra ga keikoku sa reta koto o miru toki, tsumari basse rareru ka, soretomo (shinpan no)-ji ni naru madedearu. Yagate kare-ra wa, dochiraga yori hidoi tachibadeari, dochira ga yowai seiryokudearu ka o shirudearou
Arrā wa michibiki o motomeru mono ni taishi, onmichibiki o fuyasa reru. Soshite kuchi sutarenai zenkō wa,-nushi no omotode wa hōshō ni oite sugure, mata kaeri-sho ni oite masaru
Anata wa waga shirushi o kyohi shita mono o mita ka. Daga kare wa,`watashi wa tomi to shison to ni, kitto megumarerudearou.' To iu
Kare wa yūgen-kai o mi todoketa no ka. Soretomo jihibukai okata no nanrakano yakusoku o eta no ka
Iya kesshite sōde wanai. Ware wa kare no iu koto o kiroku shi, kare ni taisuru chōbatsu o nobasudearou
Kare-ra no itte iru koto wa subete ware ga hikitori, kare wa tadaichinin de waga moto ni kurudearou
Kare-ra wa arrā no soto ni kamigami o tate, kare-ra o chūsai-sha ni shiyou to shite iru
Kesshite sōde wanai. Kare-ra (kamigami) wa sono sūhai o kyohi shi, kare-ra ni taishi teki ni narou
Kare-ra o sosonokasu tame ni, ware ga fushinjin-sha ni taishi akuma-tachi o noko wa shite iru no o anata wa kigatsukanai no ka
Dakara kare-ra ni taishi seikyūdeatte wa naranai. Ware wa tadatada kare-ra no tame ni (kagira reta yūyo no hi)-sū o kazoeru dakedearu
Sonohi, ware wa omo o osoreru mono o (meiyo no) shisetsu o mukaeru yō ni jihibukaki okata (no omoto) ni atsume
ware wa tsumibukaimono o,-jū no gun o mizu ni ou yō ni, jigoku ni oitateru
Jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o eta mono no soto wa, dare mo torinasu chikara o motanaidearou
Mata kare-ra wa iu. `Jihibukaki okata wa ko o mōke rareru
Tashikani anata gata wa, hidoi koto o iu monodearu
Ten wa sakeyou to shi,-chi wa warete setsusetsu ni nari, yamayama wa kuzureochiyou
Sore wa kare-ra ga, jihibukaki okata ni taishi,(ari mo shinai)-ko no na o (torinasu mono to shite) tonaeta tamedearu
Ko o mōke rareru koto wa, jihibukaki okata ni wa arienai
Ten to ji ni oite, jihibukaki okata no shimo be to shite, makari denai mono wa tada no 1-ri mo nai nodearu
Hontōni kare wa, kare-ra no (subete) o keisan shi, kare-ra no kazu o kazoe rareru
Mata shinpan no hi ni wa, kare-ra wa onōno hitori de kare no omoto ni makari deru
Shinkō shite zenkō ni hagemu mono ni wa, jihibukai okata wa, kare-ra ni itsukushimi o ataerudearou
Ware ga (kuruān) o anata no kotoba (Arabia-go) de kudashi wakari yasuku shita no wa, anata ga,-nushi o osoreru mono ni kippō o tsutae, giron-suki no mono ni keikoku suru tamedearu
Ware wa, kare-ra izen ni ikaga ni ōku no sedai o horoboshita kotodearou. Anata wa (ima), sorera no naka no hitori demo mikake rareru no ka. Matawa kare-ra no sasayaki o kiku koto ga dekiru no ka
Tā hā
Ware ga anata ni kuruān o kudashita no wa, anata o nayamasu tamede wanai
Omo o osoreru mono e no, kunkai nihokanaranai
Daichi to takai sho ten to o tsukuri nasa reru, kare kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Jihibukaki okata wa, gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru mono, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono, mata, shimetta tsuchi no shita ni aru mono wa, subete kare no monodearu
Tatoe anata ga ōgoe de hanashite mo (Sekiri naku), kare wa, hime rareta koto mo kakusa rete iru koto mo shitte ora reru
Arrā, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Mottomo utsukushī gyomei wa kare ni zokusuru
Mūsā no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
Kare ga hi o mite, kazoku ni itta toki no koto o omoi nasai. `Tomare, watashi wa hi o mita. Tabun asoko kara, hi-wa o mochikaeru koto ga dekiyou. Aruiwa ano hi de, michibika reru kamo shirenai
Daga kare ga soko ni kita toki,-goe ga atte yoba reta. `Mūsā yo
hontōni ware wa anata no omodearu. Dakara kutsu o nuge. Ima anata wa, towā no hijiridani ni iru nodearu
Ware wa anata o eranda. Dakara (anata ni) keiji suru koto o kike
Hontōni ware wa arrādearu. Ware no soto ni kami wanai. Dakara ware ni tsukae, ware o kokoro ni daite reihai no tsutome o mamore
Tashikani (shūmatsu no)-ji wa kuru nodearuga, sore o himete okitai no wa, kakujin ga doryoku shita tokoro ni ōji, mukui o uke saseru tamedearu
Dakara, kore o shinjinaide jibun no yokubō ni shitagau-sha-tachi kara tōzakari, anata o hametsu kara sukue
Anata no migite ni aru soreha nanika, mūsā yo
Kare wa mōshiageta. `Kore wa tsuedesu. Watashi wa kore ni motare, mata hitsuji no tame ni kore de (konoha o) uchiotoshi, mata, sono soto no yō ni kyōshimasu
Kare wa ōse rareta. `Mūsā yo, sore o nage yo
Kare ga sore o nageta tokoro, sokuza ni soreha hebi ni natte, hai mawatta
Kare wa ōse rareta. `Sore o osae yo. Osorete wa naranai. Ware wa sore o gen no yō ni kaesudearou
Sorekara anata no te o, wakinoshita ni ire yo. Nani no sawari mo nai no ni, sore wa shiroku narou. Kore wa imahitotsu no shirushi
Ware ga saidai no shirushi o, anata ni shimesu tamedearu
Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontōni kare wa kōman hidōdearu
Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, watashi no mune o hirogete kudasai
Watashi no shigoto o yōi ni shite kudasai
Watashi no shita no motsure o hogushite
watashi no kotoba o, kare-ra ni wakara sete kudasai
Mata watashi no kazoku no naka kara, enjo-sha o o sazuke kudasai
Watashi no kyōdai, hārūn o
watashi ni kasei shi
watashi no shigoto ni kyōryoku suru yō ni sa sete kudasai
Sore wa watashi-tachi ga, anata o ōku tatae
mata fudan ni anata o nenzuru tamedearimasu
Hontōni anata koso, watashi-tachi o mimamori kudasa reru katadearimasu
Kare wa ōse rareta. `Mūsā yo, hontōni anata no negai wa kikitodoke rareta
Ware wa, konomae ni mo anata ni megumi o hodokoshita
Sonotoki wa, waga ishi o anata no haha ni tsutaeta

“(Sonoko o) hako no naka ni irete, kawa ni nage yo. Kawa ga kare o kishi ni uchi age, ware no tekideari, mata kono-ko no teki ga hiroiageyou. ” Soshite anata no ue ni, ware no ai o sosogi kakeru. Sorede ware no me (hogo) no moto de sodate rareru koto ni narou

Sonotoki anata no ane ga, makari dete,“watashi ga (Sonoko o) sodateru mono o, o oshie shimashou ka. ” To itta. Kōshite ware wa, haha no te ni anata o kaeshi, sorede kano on'na mo manzoku shi, kanashimi mo kieta. Mata anata wa hito o koroshita. Daga ware wa kunō kara anata o sukui, iroiro to anata o kokoromita. Sorekara sū-nen no ma, madoyan no min no naka ni taizai shi, sorekara sadame rareta yō ni, anata wa koko ni kita nodearu. Mūsā yo
Ware wa anata o ware (ni hōshi sa seru) tame ni, sodateageta
Anata to kyōdai wa, ware no shirushi o tazusaete ike. Soshite ware o nenzuru koto o okotatte wa naranai
Anata gata ryōnin wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontōni kare wa kōman hidōdearu
Daga kare ni monoshizukana toki-kata de katare. Kare wa kunkai o ukeireru ka, matawa ware o osorerudearou
Kare-ra ryōnin wa itta. `Omo yo, hontōni kare ga isoide watashi-tachi ni (gai o kuwae) mata hōgai no koto o suru no o osoremasu
Kare wa ōse rareta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Hontōni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni iru. Kiite ori mite iru nodearu

Dakara anata gata ryōnin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga ī. “Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuhō shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontōni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu
Hontōni watashi-tachi ni, tashika ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Kyohi suru mono mata somuki saru mono ni wa chōbatsu (ga machikamaete iru dakedearu).”
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Mūsā yo, anata gata no omo wa daredearu no ka
Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Watashi-tachi no omo koso wa, ban'yū o sōzō shi, hitorihitori ni (sugata ya shishitsu sono soto o) fuyo sa re, sarani michibiki o ataeru katadearu
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Sorenara sugisatta sedai no mono wa dō naru no ka
Kare wa itta. `Sore ni kansuru chishiki wa, shosatsu ni shirusa rete omo no omoto ni arimasu. Watashi no omo wa, ayamari o okasu koto mo naku, wasureru koto mo arimasen

Kare wa, daichi o anata gata no gashō to sa re, anata gata no tame, soko ni michi o tateyoko ni tsuke, mata ten kara ame o furase rareru. Sore ni yotte, ware wa sorezore no kotonatta shiyū no shokubutsu o seichō sa seru
Tabe, mata anata gata no kachiku o hōboku shi nasai. Hontōni sono nakaniha, richi aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga aru
Ware wa, sore (doro) kara anata gata o tsukuri, soreni anata gata o kaera se, mata sore kara imaichido hikidasu nodearu
Ware wa kare (firuaun) ni, subete no waga shirushi o shimeshita nodaga, kare wa kyogidearu to shite kyohi shita
Kare wa itta. `Mūsā yo, anata gata wa majutsu de, kono kuni kara watashi-tachi o oidasu tame ni kita no ka
Sorenara, watashi-tachi mo sono yōna majutsu o anata ni mochidasou. Sā, watashi-tachi to anata no ma de yakusoku shite kōkai no basho o sadame, watashi-tachi mo anata mo sore o tagaenai yō ni shiyou
Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Anata to no kaigō no yakusoku wa,-sai no hidearu. Hitobito o hirumae ni o atsume kudasai
Sokode firuaun wa hikitori, yagate keikaku o nette (kaette) kita

Mūsā wa kare-ra ni itta. `Anata gata wa wazawai ni audarou. Kare ga anata gata o shobatsu shite horobosa reru koto no nai yō, arrā ni taishi netsuzō shi, uso o itte wa naranai. (Uso o) netsuzō suru mono wa kanarazu shippai suru
Sokode kare-ra wa otagai ni saku o nette ronji attaga, mochiron sono sōdan wa himitsu ni shita
Kare-ra wa itta. `Tashikani ryōnin wa majutsu-shidearu. Kare-ra wa ano majutsu de anata gata o kokudo kara oidashi, anata gata no sugureta narawashi o konzetsu shiyou to nozonde iru
Sorede kakuji no keikaku o neri, sorekara retsu o nashite takare. Kyō shōri o eru mono wa, kanarazu sakaeru nodearu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Mūsā yo, anata ga nageru ka, soretomo watashi-tachi ga saki ni nageyou ka
Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Iya, anata gataga sakini nage nasai.' Suru to miruga ī. Kare ni wa nawa to tsue ga, majutsu de (ikite) hashiru ka no yō ni mieta
Sore de mūsā wa, sukoshi kokoro ni osore o kanjita
Ware wa itta. `Osoreru ni wa oyobanai. Hontōni anata ga jōzudearu
Anata no migite ni aru mono o nage nasai. Kare-ra ga tsukutta mono o nomikome. Majutsu-shi no gomakashi nisuginai. Majutsu-shi wa doko kara kite mo,(nanigoto mo) seikō shinai
Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, fuku shite sajida shi,`watashi-tachi wa, mūsā to hārūn no omo o shinkō shimasu.' To itta

Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontōni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tōmokudearou. Anata gata no ryōte to ryōashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chōbatsu ga yori genjūde, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou

Kare-ra (majutsu-shi) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, watashi-tachi ni shimesa reta meihakuna shirushi, mata watashi-tachi o sōzō nasa reta kare ijō ni, anata o omonjiru koto wa fukanōdesu. Sorede anata no kettei sa reru koto o jisshi shite kudasai. Daga anata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite dake, hanketsu nasaru ni sugimasen

Hontōni watashi-tachi ga omo o shinkō suru no wa, watashi-tachi no go Chino o yurushi o koi, mata anata ga murijīdeshita majutsu ni taishite, o yurushi o kou tamedearimasu. Arrā wa shizen ni shite towa ni iki rareru kata de ara remasu
Tsumibito to shite omo no omoto ni kuru mono ni wa, hontōni jigoku ga aru. Sono Chū de kare wa shi mo naku nama mo nai
Daga, ōku no zenkō o shite, shinja to shite kare no moto ni kita mono ni wa takai ikai o ataeru
Kare (shinja) wa eien ni kawa ga shita o nagareru adon (eden) no rakuen ni sumu nodearu. Kore wa, jibun o junketsu ni mamotta mono e no hōshōdearu

Ware wa mūsā ni keiji shita. `Ware no shimo be-tachi to tomoni yoru ni tabidatte, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, umi no naka ni kawaita michi o (anata no tsue de) uchi ake. (Firuaun no gunzei ni) oitsuka reru koto o shinpai suru na. Mata (umi o) kowagaru koto wanai
Hatashite firuaun wa, gunzei o hikiite kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) o ottaga, kaisui ga kare-ra o kanzen ni suichū ni shizume ōtte shimatta
(Ko no yō ni) firuaun wa sono min o mayowa se, tadashiku michibikanakatta nodearu
Isuraeru no shison yo, ware wa anata gata o teki kara sukui, mata (Shinai) yama no migigawa de anata gata to yakusoku o musubi, Man'na to uzura o anata gata ni kudashita

(Soshite ware wa itta. ) `Ware ga anata gata ni sazuketa yoi mono o tabe nasai. Saritote ware no ikari ga anata gata ni kudaranai yō,-hō o koete wa naranai. Dare demo ware no ikari ni fureru mono wa, kanarazu horobiru
Daga kaigo shite shinkō shi, zenkō ni isoshimi, sonogo (tadashiku) michibika reru mono ni wa, ware wa tabitabi kan'yō o shimesu
Mūsā yo, naze anata wa, jibun no min yori hanare, sakinjite isogu no ka
Kare wa mōshiageta. `Kare-ra wa, watashi no ashiato o otte mairimasu. Omo yo, watashi wa anata ga o yorokobi ni naru yō isoida nodesu
Kare wa ōse rareta. `Hontōni ware wa anata no satta nochi anata no min o kokoromitaga, sāmirī ga kare-ra o mayowa seta

Sokode mūsā wa, ikari kanashinde min no moto ni kaeri, itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, anata gata no omo wa, yoi yakusoku o anata gata ni musuba renakatta nodesu ka. Anata gata ni wa amarini nagai yakusoku no yō ni omowa reta nodesu ka. Soretomo omo kara no o ikari ga anata gata ni kudaru koto o nozonda nodesu ka. Dakara watashi to no yakusoku o chigaeta nodesu ka

Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa jibun ni tashikana konkyo ga atte, anata to no yakusoku o yabutta node wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa Ejiputo hito no, sōshoku-hin no omoni o owasa retanode, sore o (hi no naka ni) nageireta nodesu. Sāmirī mo nagekonda yō nidesu
Sokode kare (sāmirī) wa, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, hoeru koushi no gūzō o tsukutta. Soshite itta. `Kore wa anata gata no kami de, mata mūsā no kamidesu, kare wa wasureta nodesu
Soreha, hitokoto mo kare-ra ni kotaezu, mata kare-ra ni gai mo naku eki mo nai koto ga wakaranai nodearou ka

Hārūn wa (kono koto no) mae ni, jūbun ni kare-ra ni itta. `Hitobito yo. Anata gata wa kore ni yotte kokoromi rareru nodesu. Omo wa, hontōni jihibukai katadesu. Dakara watashi ni shitagai, watashi no meirei ni fukujū shi nasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, mūsā ga kaette kuru made,(koushi) o ogami tsudzukerudeshou
Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Hārūn yo, kare-ra ga mayou no o mita toki, nani ga anata (no gimu no rikō) o samatageta nodesu ka
Watashi ni shitagawanai nodesu ka. Watashi no meirei ni somuku nodesu ka

Kare (hārūn) wa itta. `Watashi no haha no ko yo, watashi no hige ya atama (no kami) o tsukamu no o tomete kudasai. Hontōni watashi wa anata ga,“Isuraeru no shison no ma o bunretsu sa semashita. Mata jibun no kotoba o mamorimasendeshita. ” To iu no o osoreta nodesu
Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `De wa sāmirī yo, anata no (okonatta koto no) mokuteki wa nandesuka

Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, kare-ra no minakatta mono o mita nodesu. Sorede shito no ashiato kara hitonigiri no (tsuchi) o totte, sore o (koushi no zō) ni nagetsuketa nodesu. Watashi no kokoro ga, sō watashi ni shisa shita nodesu

Kare (mūsā) wa itta. `Dete iki nasai. Ikite iru kagiri wa,“-fuka sawa” to iu koto ni narou. Kesshite yaburenai yakusoku (shobatsu) ga anata ni wa aru. Anata ga nomerikonde sūhai shite ita kamigami o mi nasai. Watashi-tachi wa kon'na mono wa yaite umi no naka ni makichirasudeshou
(Hitobito yo) hontōni anata gata no kami wa arrā dakedesu. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodesu. Kare wa, subete no mono o sono o chishiki ni hōyō nasa remasu
Kono yō ni ware wa, izen ni okotta shōsoku o anata ni katari, waga moto kara anata ni kunkai o kudashita
Dare demo sore ni somuku mono wa, fukkatsu no hi ni kanarazu omoni o oudearou
Kare-ra wa itsu made mo kono jōtai no mamadearu. Fukkatsu no hi no omoni koso, kare-ra ni tori wazawaidearu
Rappa ga fuka reru hi, kono Ni~Tsu ware wa kumotta me no tsumibukaimono o shōshū suru
Kare-ra wa sasayaki atte,`anata gata wa 10 (Ni~Tsu) mo taizai shinakattadearou.' To iu
Ware wa kare-ra no iou to suru koto o yoku shitte iru. Sonotoki mo seko ni taketa mono ga,`watashi-tachi no taizai wa 1-nichi ni mo naranai.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa yama ni tsuite, anata ni toudearou. Sokode itte yaru ga ī. `Watashi no omo wa, sore o konagona ni shite maki chirasa reru
Kare wa, sore o tairana hirachi ni nasa re
soko ni wa, magari mo ōtotsu mo minaideshou
Sonohi kare-ra wa yobi-te ni shitagai hagureru wake ni wa ikanai. Jihibukai okata no gozende wa,-goe wa hikuku nari, shinobiashi no oto no soto wa kikanaidearou
Sonohi, jihibukai okata ni o yurushi o ete iru mono igai no torinashi wa muekidearou. Sono-sha no kotoba wa, kare ni ukeire rareru
Kare wa, kare-ra no mae ni aru koto, ushiro ni aru koto o shitte ora reru. Daga kare-ra (ningen) no chishikide wa, sore o hakari shiru koto wa dekinai
Kare-ra no kao wa, eisei shi jison suru okata no gozen de utsumuite irudearou. Soshite zaigō o ou mono ni, ukabu se wanai
Daga zenkō ni isoshimi, shinkō shita mono wa, nani no shinpai mo naku,(-nushi kara no hōshō o) herasa reru koto mo nai nodearu
Kono yō ni, ware wa kono keiji o Arabia-go no kurua ― n to shite kudashi, sono Chū de iroiro to keikoku o tsutaeta. Tabun kare-ra wa omo o osore, matawa kyōkun o etoku shiyou

Arrā wa, ito takaku ora reru shin no ōjadearu. Anata (yogen-sha muhanmado) ni taisuru keiji ga kanryō shinai mae ni, kuruān o isoide wa naranai. Mushiro (inotte) ii nasai. `Omo yo, watashi no chishiki o fukamete kudasai
Ware wa, izen ni ādamu ni kaku to yakusoku shita. Daga kare wa (sono rikō o) wasureta. Ware wa, kare ga sore ni kengodearu to wa mitomenai
Ware ga tenshi-tachi ni taishi,`ādamu ni sajida shi nasai.' To itta toki o omoi nasai. Iburīsu no soto kare-ra wa sajida shita. Daga kare wa kyohi shita
Sorede ware wa itta. `Ādamu yo, hontōni kono-sha wa, anata to anata no tsuma no tekidearu. Sorede anata gata ryōnin wa kono rakuen kara oidasa rete, fukō ni ochī iranai yō ki o tsuke nasai
Kokode wa, anata gata no tame ni (jūbun no onmegumi ga atte) ue mo naku, hadaka ni naru koto mo nai
Mata kawaki o oboeru koto mo naku, taiyō no atsusa ni mo sarasa renai
Shikashi akuma wa kare ni sasayaite itta. `Ādamu yo. Watashi wa anata ni eisei no ki to, otoroeru koto no nai ōken o oshiete agemashou
Ryōnin ga sore o taberu to, haji kashī tokoro ga arawa ni natta. Sore de kare-ra wa sono en no konoha de soko o ōi hajimeta. Kōshite ādamu wa omoni somuki, go chi o okashita
Sonogo,-nushi wa kare o erabi, kaigo o yurusa re onmichibiki ni nara reta

Kare wa ōse rareta. `Anata gata ryōnin wa issho ni koko kara sagare. Anata-tachi wa tagaini teki de aru. Moshi anata gata ni ware kara michibiki ga kudareba, daredemo waga michibiki ni shitagau mono wa mayou koto naku, mata fukō ni ochīranaidearou
Daga dare demo, waga kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha wa, seikatsu ga kyūkutsu ni nari, mata shinpan no hi ni wa mōmoku de yomigaera sa rerudearou
Kare wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi wa (izen) hare-gen-shadeatta no ni, naze watashi o mōmoku to shite yomigaera seta nodesu ka
Kare wa ōse rareru. `Ware no shirushi ga anata ni kudatta toki, anata wa sore o mushi shitade wanai ka. Kyō anata wa sore to dōyō mushi sa reru nodearu
Ware wa kono yō ni shite, somuita mono to omo no shirushi o shinjinakatta mono ni mukuiru. Daga raise ni okeru chōbatsu wa, sarani kibishiku mata eizoku suru

Kare-ra ni wa onmichibiki wa nakatta no ka. Kare-ra yori izen ni mo ware wa don'nani ōku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra (kojin) no sunde ita tokoro o (ima) kare-ra wa aruite iru. Hontōni kono nakaniha richi ni tomu mono e no shirushi ga aru
Moshi,-nushi kara o kotoba ga kudasa rete inakattanaraba,(chōbatsu wa) yoke rarenai nodearu. Daga, sadame rareta (yūyo no) kigen ga aru

Dakara kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi, taiyō ga agaru mae, mata sore ga shizumu mae ni, anata no omo no eikō o tatae nasai. Nao yoru no ichiji mo, mata hiru no ryōtan ni mo tatae nasai. Kanarazu anata gata wa mitasarerudearou

Mata ware ga, kare-ra no aru burui no mono ni ataeta konoyo no seikatsu no eiga ni, anata no me o mihatte wa naranai. Ware wa, sore ni yotte kare-ra o kokoromita. Anata no omo no tamamono koso shijō de mata eizoku suru

Mata anata no kazoku ni reihai o meiji, soshite (anata mo), sore o tae nasai. Ware wa anata ni onmegumi o motomenai. Anata gata ni megumi o ataeru no wa waredearu. Zenka wa omo o osoreru mono no ue ni aru
Mata kare-ra wa,`nazekare wa, watashi-tachi ni omo kara hitotsu no shirushi o mo motarasanai nodesu ka.' To iu. Izen no sho Keisuke ni aru meishō ga, kare-ra ni kudatte irude wanai ka

Ware ga moshi kore izen ni kare-ra o shobatsu shite, horoboshite itanaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`omo yo, naze anata wa, watashi-tachi ni shito o tsukawasa renakatta nodesu ka. Sō sureba watashi-tachi wa, iyashima re kutsujoku o kōmuru mae ni, anata no shirushi ni shitagattadeshou ni.' To ittadearou
Gen tte yaru ga ī. `Kakujin wa matte iru. Dakara anata gata mo mate. Anata gata wa yagate, heitan'na michi o ayumu mono wa dare ka, mata michibika reta mono wa dare ka o shirudearou
